ruleExplore.author: $.author

ruleToc.chapterName:
$.chapter_name@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
chapterPageBeat = java.get("chapterPageBeat");
chapterUrl = java.get("chapterUrl");
chapterName = java.get("chapterName");

sourceUrl1 = baseUrl.match(/(http[s]?:\/\/[\.a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)(\/)/)[1];
java.log(sourceUrl1);
sourceUrl2 = baseUrl.match(/(http[s]?:\/\/[\.a-zA-Z0-9_-]+\/[\/a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)(\/)/)[1]
java.log(sourceUrl2);

if(chapterPageBeat!=""){
f=new RegExp(chapterPageBeat,"i");
cont=String(result).replace(/\s+/g, " ").match(f)[1];
}
else{cont=String(result).replace(/\s+/g, " ").replace(/>\s+</g, "><");}

var chapterList = [];
name = cont.match(new RegExp(chapterName,"g"));
url = cont.match(new RegExp(chapterUrl,"g"));

for(var i = 0; i < name.length; i ++){
text = name[i].match(chapterName)[1];
uri = url[i].match(chapterUrl)[1];

if(uri.indexOf("/") == -1){
	 	href=sourceUrl2 +"/"+ uri;
	 	}else{href = sourceUrl1 + uri;}
	 	href = href +","+ JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer":href}})
	 	
chapterList.push({
		 	  text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
 }

chapterList
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

<js>
if(/netUrl/.test(baseUrl)){
  b = source.getKey();
  url1 = String(baseUrl).replace(/netUrl\//,'');
  page = String(java.ajax(url1)).match(/\(第1\/(\d+)页\)/)[1];
  url2 = String(url1).replace(/(\d+).html/,"$1_"+page+".html");
  url = b+java.ajax(url2).match(/<a href="([^"]+)">下一节<\/a>/)[1];
  java.put('url',url);
result=java.ajax(url);
}
result
</js>.RBGsectionThree-content p@textNodes

<js>
list=[];
base = source.getKey();
lis=java.getElements('section .BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a');
for(i in lis){
	url=lis[i].attr('href');
	/javascript/.test(url)?url='/netUrl'+lis[i-1].attr('href'):url;
	url=base+url;
	list.push({"text":lis[i].text(),"href":url})
}
list
</js>

bookSourceComment: // Error: 搜索失效

网站外观看着和 69书吧 挺像，但实际网页结构元素什么的不一样（69好书是完全一样，规则都可以通用），估计是个蹭名字的？不过我找了几本连载的书看了下正文内容倒是基本一样，可能是爬的 69书吧？所以也不必在乎是真是假了，能用就行（毕竟能直连又没人机验证，当个平替也不错~
另外，该网站默认是繁体的，网页加载完成后会执行 JS 根据浏览器语言转为简体，但书源是需要手动转的，不过我也看了，这网站默认的繁体其实也是直接机器简繁转换的（毕竟这些小说本身都是简体发布的），所以转换回来后就和小说本身内容一样了。

bookSourceComment: 有时候网站会报错 502 导致书源请求失败，暂不清楚是网站限制访问频率，还是单纯的网站后端问题，我尝试加上遇到 502 就自动重试一次，发现还是直接 502，所以也没啥好办法，建议遇到搜索/发现/详情/目录/正文为空时，可以重试一次（目录/正文则是再 刷新 一次）

20231123 整体修复-尐哖
旧域名：https://api.aixdzs.com
exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey();
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> 
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

<js>
if(/netUrl/.test(baseUrl)){
  b = source.getKey();
  url1 = String(baseUrl).replace(/netUrl\//,'');
  page = String(java.ajax(url1)).match(/\(第1\/(\d+)页\)/)[1];
  url2 = String(url1).replace(/(\d+).html/,"$1_"+page+".html");
  url = b+java.ajax(url2).match(/<a href="([^"]+)">下一节<\/a>/)[1];
  java.put('url',url);
result=java.ajax(url);
}
result

list=[];
base = source.getKey();
lis=java.getElements('section .BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a');

	/javascript/.test(url)?url='/netUrl'+lis[i-1].attr('href'):url;
	url=base+url;
	list.push({"text":lis[i].text(),"href":url})
}
list
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> 
//注意：一般网站默认首页(即baseUrl)有搜索框，否则请填入搜索页面地址
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

bookSourceComment: 增加自动验证，不行就手动登录，登录url要与源url一致。 解决目前新的字体格式文字显示的问题(例替换显示为'的')。 by812@221012 解决目前所见到的所有问题，包括页面解析、分页有的页面获取不到、图片转文字等问题，并对内容中出现的翻页断行、以前流行的35字换行排版、部分内容显示HTML源码、推广文字、广告等进行了恢复与过滤。 效果自认为是不错的，就是慢，巨慢，分页多的章节可能获取文字就要几分钟，毕竟，要做过滤和处理。 凑合用吧兄弟们，后续暂时不准备修改了。 地址发布页(浏览器打开) https://zozozo.xyz/ http://www.diyibanzhu666.xyz 目前可用地址： https://www.7yydstxt426.com/ https://www.7yydstxt226.com/ https://www.7yydstxt434.com/ https://www.8yydstxt234.com/ https://6yydstxt178.com/ 获取最新可用网址 大家可以根据自己的网络情况选一个最快的来用 替换👉源域名👈链接即可 注意版主一系各站点数据库并非完全同步，所以换了地址之后原有的小说如果追更就需要重新搜索。 建议用复制出来源换个名称再批量改源的方式来做。

        Login();
    }

        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);

        //exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';

T = `{{Get('t')}}`;

url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;

url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/filter/classify';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url)).data.classifyList[0].list;
R = `{{Get('r')+1}}`;

Status = `{{get('status',Get('p'))}}`;
Zone = `{{get('zone',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/filter/list?theme=${kind[i].tagId}&cate=${Cate}&status=${Status}&zone=${Zone}&sortType=${R}&page={{page}}&size=20`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tagName, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false));

            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name;
            var url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option);
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': cache.get(java.md5Encode16(url + "Author")),
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': url
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.subList[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else if (baseUrl.includes('/rank/')) {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data;
        var D = ['日','周','月','总'];
        var K = ['人气:','吐槽:','订阅:'];
        var index = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*by_time=(\d).*/, '$1'));
        var index1 = parseInt(baseUrl.replace(/.*rank_type=(\d).*/, '$1'));
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = (list[i].status || '').replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest + '〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].comic_id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option)
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.comicList;
        for (i in list) {
            var s = '';
            var k = list[i].status.replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + list[i].types.replace(/\//g, ',');
            var latest = list[i].last_update_chapter_name + (list[i].last_updatetime > 0 ? ('〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].last_updatetime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕') : '');
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': list[i].authors,
                'kind': s + ',' + k,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover,
                'url': Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/detail/' + list[i].id + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option)
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list || !list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.comicList) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

loginUrl:
<js>
function getToken(){	return (source.getLoginHeaderMap()!=null && source.getLoginHeaderMap()!="")?source.getLoginHeaderMap().get("login_token"):"0f6bd1d063f202f71c3b84678027ce81"
	}
function getA(){
	return (source.getLoginHeaderMap()!=null && source.getLoginHeaderMap()!="")?source.getLoginHeaderMap().get("account"):"萌友521068519938";
	}
function encode(word){
  	return java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray("L6alxSR4ttjXvcGpZozYtdcJtG4l0tSnQplRUONIRsw="), java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")).encryptBase64(word);
	}
function decode(word){
    	return java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray("L6alxSR4ttjXvcGpZozYtdcJtG4l0tSnQplRUONIRsw="), java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")).decryptStr(word);
}
    	
 function login(){
 	login_name=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号")
passwd=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
    let jsonStr = {
        "login_name": login_name,
        "passwd": passwd,
        "app_signature_md5": "f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94",
        "app_version": "4.1.1",
        "channel": "default"
    }
    let body = "secret_content=" + encode(JSON.stringify(jsonStr));
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    
    url = "https://app.shubl.com/signup/login," + JSON.stringify(option)
    resp = JSON.parse(decode(java.ajax(url)))
    if (resp.code == "100000") {
     body = {
     	"login_token":resp.data.login_token,
     	"account":encodeURI(resp.data.reader_info.account)
     	}
     source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(body)) 
    } else {
        java.toast('❗️ ' + resp.tip + ' ❗️')
    }
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>
p@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header));
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>

}

list

searchUrl:
<js> 
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '精品榜',
    '人气榜',
    '推荐榜',
    '黑马榜',
    '新更新',
    '新漫画'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/rank/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
sort = [
    '冒险','热血','都市','玄幻','悬疑','耽美','恋爱','生活',
    '搞笑','穿越','修真','后宫','女主','古风','连载','完结'
];
for (i in sort) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/sort/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(sort[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (sort.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (sort.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': i == 0 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href') + ',{"webView":true}'
        });
    }
    url = Get('url') + '/morechapter,{"body":"id=' + baseUrl.replace(/^.*\/(.*)\/$/,'$1') + '","method":"POST"}';
    list1 = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;
    for (i in list1) {
        title = list1[i].chaptername;
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': title,
            'link': baseUrl + list1[i].chapterid + '.html,{"webView":true}'
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data.reverse());
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

bookSourceComment:
可以无脑获取搜索地址哦，大家可以试试。
‼️先填入正确的Url再试‼️
searchUrl:
<js> 
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>
